attributes.action: keep taxpayers money in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap the Irish compensation scheme £12000 a time
Stop foreign workers tax credits for their families at home
Bailing out banks that have the government at ransom but still not lending money.
Fund the construction industry buy the 1000s of building sites left vacant and fund a government scheme to have 1 nationalised bank.
 Control the loans at a low rate allowing the sites to be sold as finished properties
Mortgaged via the government and returning a profit. people will then be allowed to secure funding as individuals and not allowed to over borrow 
The construction industry would start to recover 
Encouragement would be possible to train young people 
 The car industries stock piles cars if they want to survive then let them sell off their stocks
Scrap council tax for people over the age of 65 
Remove the no sacking policy for incompetent civil servants and force people in positions of power to justify their spending and incompetence then they would not be so happy to waste other peoples money.
Encourage tax exiles to bring their money back into this country where there wealth will fund employment
STOP FIGHTING OTHER PEOPLES WARS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
